name: part_007
file: tmp_【#2ETAnniv】 Zeta's Mini 3D Party!【Vestia Zeta ⧸ Hololive ID】 [YOD6oVkRp9E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Vestia Zeta performs the song 'Love Song' by 703goushit.
MC section where Zeta interacts with the audience, shows off her pockets, and prepares for the next song.
Vestia Zeta starts performing 'Cho Medetai Song ~Konnani Shiawasede Iinokana?~' by FRUITS ZIPPER.

subtitles.original: 四小節の中
subtitles.english: In these four bars

subtitles.original: 不細工な心　まとめられたらな
subtitles.english: I wish I could gather up this ugly heart

subtitles.original: 打ち明けすぎないよう
subtitles.english: So that I don't reveal too much

subtitles.original: ちょっと下手な振りして解けた
subtitles.english: I pretended to be a bit bad at it and it came undone

subtitles.original: 私をもっと見ていてほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to look at me more

subtitles.original: なんて今夜限りのメロディを
subtitles.english: A melody for tonight only

subtitles.original: 聴いてくれたりしないかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you'd listen to it

subtitles.original: だめかな
subtitles.english: Is it no good?

subtitles.original: 数え切れないフレーズも
subtitles.english: Countless phrases too

subtitles.original: 二度と出せない響きも
subtitles.english: And the sounds I can never make again

subtitles.original: 伝えたいよ　起承転結はいらないから
subtitles.english: I want to tell you, I don't need a beginning, middle, and end

subtitles.original: 何も手に付かないほど
subtitles.english: So much that I can't focus on anything

subtitles.original: 奏でている鼓動が今ねぇ
subtitles.english: The pulse I'm playing now, hey

subtitles.original: また窓を曇らせていくルーム
subtitles.english: It's fogging up the windows of the room again

subtitles.original: ただひたすら貴方を歌うよ
subtitles.english: I'll just keep singing about you

subtitles.original: 声を枯らして叫んだよ
subtitles.english: I shouted until my voice was hoarse

subtitles.original: 腹が立つくらい愛
subtitles.english: An love that almost makes me angry

subtitles.original: 吐き出しても体温だけ上がったままで
subtitles.english: Even if I spit it out, my body temperature stays high

subtitles.original: 僕は求めたりしない
subtitles.english: I won't ask for anything more

subtitles.original: 貴方を愛するためだけ
subtitles.english: Just for the sake of loving you

subtitles.original: 生まれたの自信ないままの歌声
subtitles.english: I was born with this voice, still lacking confidence

subtitles.original: いつか綺麗に透き通る愛してるを
subtitles.english: One day, a beautiful, transparent "I love you"

subtitles.original: 愛してるを
subtitles.english: I love you

subtitles.original: Waaaaa! Hehehe.
subtitles.english: Waaaaa! Hehehe.

subtitles.english: How was that?

subtitles.english: Are you guys happy?

subtitles.original: So weird talking to myself in VR.
subtitles.english: So weird talking to myself in VR.

subtitles.original: It's okay, I'm used to it.
subtitles.english: It's okay, I'm used to it.

subtitles.original: Are you guys happy?
subtitles.english: Are you guys happy?

subtitles.original: Because...
subtitles.english: Because...

subtitles.original: I'm the happiest.
subtitles.english: I'm the happiest.

subtitles.original: You know what makes me so happy? Now that I think about it.
subtitles.english: You know what makes me so happy? Now that I think about it.

subtitles.original: I have one thing that makes me so happy.
subtitles.english: I have one thing that makes me so happy.

subtitles.original: Pockets! Pockets!
subtitles.english: Pockets! Pockets!

subtitles.original: I'm thinking, so for my next song, it's something related to happiness, I think.
subtitles.english: I'm thinking, so for my next song, it's something related to happiness, I think.

subtitles.original: Sometimes, you know, when you get too happy, you start to question yourself.
subtitles.english: Sometimes, you know, when you get too happy, you start to question yourself.

subtitles.original: You're like, "Hmm... is it really okay for me to be this happy?"
subtitles.english: You're like, "Hmm... is it really okay for me to be this happy?"

subtitles.original: Kayak, "Hah? Kok iya boleh ya sesenang ini?" Hah?
subtitles.english: Like, "Huh? Is it really okay to be this happy?" Huh?

subtitles.original: Kok iya? Senang ya?
subtitles.english: Is that so? Happy, right?

subtitles.original: So, I think this next song I'm gonna be wearing something... I'm gonna be wearing something that makes me happy.
subtitles.english: So, I think this next song I'm gonna be wearing something... I'm gonna be wearing something that makes me happy.

subtitles.original: Oh, wait. Don't. I know what you guys are about to say.
subtitles.english: Oh, wait. Don't. I know what you guys are about to say.

subtitles.original: You guys are gonna say that I have six ears, which is not true.
subtitles.english: You guys are gonna say that I have six ears, which is not true.

subtitles.original: It's just not true, I don't have six ears.
subtitles.english: It's just not true, I don't have six ears.

subtitles.original: Okay, let me get ready. Should I go on all fours like a furry?
subtitles.english: Okay, let me get ready. Should I go on all fours like a furry?

subtitles.original: Guys? This?
subtitles.english: Guys? This?

subtitles.original: Kayak kucing. Kayak kucing beneran nggak sih? Kayak...

subtitles.original: Kayaknya nggak gitu deh.

subtitles.original: Kalau tampak belakang giman?

subtitles.original: Tapi norak nggak sih kalau misalnya mulai lagunya dari belakang?
subtitles.english: But isn't it tacky if, for example, the song starts from the back?

subtitles.original: Apa dari sini? Hmm...

subtitles.original: Nge-split nggak sih? Jangan jangan jangan.

subtitles.original: Ya udah gini aja. Berdiri aja deh.
